Description: Plain weave textile with brocading; straight-side right-angled border in undyed linen containing brocaded diamonds in undyed linen with small diamonds inside in coloured wool; in the centre of the band is an all over lattice pattern of small beige diamonds with small crosses (red and blue); in each segment one geometric motif (star/cross/lozenge) or stylised floral motif in coloured wool; warp-undyed linen (S/13), weft-undyed linen (S/16), weft brocading in red, orange, blue and green wool (S spun Z ply) and undyed linen (S/paired); all edges are cut or ragged
